name: Child Aid Foundation
briefDescription: Child Aid Foundation provides comprehensive aid and care to underprivileged children, boys and girls, of all ages and academic levels on both a residential and non-residential basis. Such aid and care includes food, clothing, shelter, medical care, personal supplies, education, educational supplies, counselling, and initial job placement. There are presently over 400 children enrolled in C.A.F.â€™s three projects
